weirdness.description: Controls the randomness and creativity of the generation. Higher values are more chaotic.

Normal.description: Baseline for most genres. Good balance.

High.description: Experimental, chaotic, unexpected results. Good for blends.

weirdness.v5_guidance: Don't jump above 50% immediately. Adjust in small increments.

style_influence.description: Controls how strictly the model adheres to the style tags.

Loose.description: Open interpretation. Good for incompatible genre blends.

style_influence.v5_guidance: If the model isn't listening to your genre tags, increase this. If it sounds too generic, decrease it.
